title: #SSC
description: An indescribable experience of working and sharing the stage with world-class professionals ranging from Cuba, Mexico, Italy, and beyond at the Sarajevo Salsa Congress.

title: Erasmus+
description: Unforgettable journey with the Erasmus+ Programme located in Montecatini Terme, Italy, where joy and optimism filled the air alongside dance and socialization.

title: Supertalent
description: Second-ever dance performance on the stages of the Supertalent Show resulted in success, with the judges' acknowledgment serving as the wind at one's back.
